data.title: List of The Grove Dictionary of American Music articles on Grove Music Online
data.text:
New entries from The Grove Dictionary of American Music, second edition, now available on Grove Music Online. We are in the process of publishing the remaining articles into Grove Music Online. You may find the complete dictionary online at Oxford Reference (requires a subscription) or in print.
